titles.title: A bill to require further review by the Federal Communications Commission to ensure thorough deliberation on proposed changes in the method of regulation of interstate basic service rates.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications and Finance.

bill.summary: 2/4/1988--Introduced. Directs the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to terminate the proceeding in the Matter of Policy and Rules Concerning Rates for Dominant Carriers (FCC Docket No. 87-313). Prohibits the FCC from commencing comparable proceedings with respect to the interstate basic telephone service offerings of dominant carriers except in accordance with a notice of proposed rulemaking, issued after 1988, that meets criteria described in this Act.
